item.description:
This is a sequel to the Halldorson Redneck Bonfire...we hope to have even more people come. We've got the burning stuff down to a bit of a science now. ;)

It will still be BYOB but we'll have soda, chips etc for the kiddos and would like to have hot coffee & hot chocolate to help keep everyone warm.

Since we'll be more settled in there should be more room for people to go inside to warm up if needed. And we'll make a big effort to have the pond lit up and available for skating...so this time absolutely bring those skates! :)

If anyone else has some advice for improving on the last bonfire...feel free to share. Hope everyone can make it!

WOO HOO...

Times are tough, which makes it the perfect time to get out of the house and laugh good and loud with friends!

Kids & Pups are welcome...and bring your friends too. ;)

The Halldorsons

More details can be found over at the Facebook event.
item.name: *Bigger* Halldorson Redneck Bonfire
